channel.title: Posts on Starcoin News
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Starcoin News

item.title: Starcoin BlockChain release the First developer version
item.description: Stacoin Blockchain released its first developer beta, Halley, which contains a lot of new features. technologies, including Move Smart Contract Language, Move Virtual Machine, and more. Developers can download a pre-compiled version here, or through the github download the source code compiled, specific compilation method You can refer to the related documents. Please refer to the documentation on how to use it.

item.title: Starcoin BlockChain release the Second developer version
item.description: The second version of the Stacoin blockchain developer beta for Halley, which includes many new features. such as upgraded stdlib, enhanced block validation logic, refactored block executors, etc. Developers can download the pre-compiled version here, you can also download the compiled source code through github, specific compilation methods You can refer to the related documents. Please refer to the documentation on how to use it.
